Nerja.title: Nerja
Nerja.byline: Nerja (pronounced like: N'air'-ha) is a seaside resort on the Costa del Sol, in the region of Andalucia of Spain.

Nera Gorge-Beușnița National Park.title: Nera Gorge-Beușnița National Park
Nera Gorge-Beușnița National Park.byline: Cheile Nerei-Beușnița National Park is in the Banat region of Romania, in Caraș-Severin County.
